description:

  File "/python2.6/site-packages/nova-2013.2.a5196.g0ead34a-py2.6.egg/nova/compute/manager.py", line 992, in _run_instance
    set_access_ip=set_access_ip)
  File "/python2.6/site-packages/nova-2013.2.a5196.g0ead34a-py2.6.egg/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1252, in _spawn
    LOG.exception(_('Instance failed to spawn'), instance=instance)
...
  File "/python2.6/site-packages/nova-2013.2.a5196.g0ead34a-py2.6.egg/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py", line 1129, in _fetch_vhd_image, callback=callback)
  File "/python2.6/site-packages/nova-2013.2.a5196.g0ead34a-py2.6.egg/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py", line 1041, in _fetch_using_dom0_plugin_with_retry,

title: xenapi: bittorrent plugin download_vhd does not accept project_id argument
